quotes.t: There are those who contend the hockey maven is a {qword}cantankerous{/qword} old coot—rife with unpopular opinions and quick to assert them
Contemporaries often found him aloof, standoffish, and {qword}cantankerous{/qword} and his mannerisms and diction inscrutable.
In his last years, Harriman was the kind of {qword}cantankerous{/qword} old man who once berated a financial planner by threatening to make him sit in the corner and wear a dunce cap.
… it's something ultimately more memorable: a self-portrait of a coolly {qword}cantankerous{/qword} woman, reformed but unrepentant.

shortdef: difficult or irritating to deal with
